game.name: ArmOut
game.shortDescription: ArmOut is an old slot machine. It just sits there doing nothing... However, it might spin whenever you press a key with chosen amount of credits. Punch that keyboard to earn those credits!!!
game.shortDescriptionEn: ArmOut is an old slot machine. It just sits there doing nothing... However, it might spin whenever you press a key with chosen amount of credits. Punch that keyboard to earn those credits!!!
